JobTitle: Sr Engineering Manager- Marketplace Fulfillment Platform
JobFullDesc: Uber’s Marketplace Engineering team creates the technology behind our ridesharing marketplace by connecting riders with drivers at the push of a button. Our solutions expand user access, deliver reliability, and provide more transportation choices to users across our global markets.About the RoleThe Fulfillment teams develop platforms to orchestrate and manage the lifecycle of ongoing orders and user sessions with millions of active participants. Consistency at millions of transactions/sec and platformization of complex business modeling are our mission. We build, maintain and optimize the foundational services/frameworks on top of which Uber's core fulfillment flow is built. This team is part of the Marketplace Org which is the real-time decision-making and systems behind Uber (ex: matching riders/drivers, pricing, fulfillment). We develop systems that can recover from business failures, monitor conformance, develop complex user state machine flows to unlock new product lines in the company. In the next 1 year, fulfillment team will be innovating in the areas of development of rental product lines, re-envisioning multi modal shopping and trip flow experience that connect multiple marketplaces (e.g., order pickup food while on trip to another destination, get a ride that combines train + uber).
